participant_1.name: Chris
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, Chris enjoys spending time with his family and appreciates the little things in life.
participant_1.background: I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday. I drive a prius. I prefer to live in the suburbs, where I can enjoy my country music without having to worry about disturbing anyone. I work and live with my wife, and we love chai tea. I enjoy coffee to help me focus on my work and family.

participant_2.name: Katie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, Katie values her relationships and enjoys exploring new culinary experiences.
participant_2.background: I am most afraid of losing my passion for things I love. I enjoy spending time with my wife and friends, and I love her pasta. I can tell right away if I'm going to like someone. I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things. I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.

content.text: Hi! My name is Katie. What's yours?
Nice to meet you, Katie! My name is Chris.
Nice to meet you too, Chris! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to go on road trips with my siblings, and I enjoy listening to country music. What about you?
I love spending time with my wife and friends, and I also love trying new things. I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for an adventure!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you have such a great family and friends.
Thanks! I'm very lucky to have them in my life. What do you like to do for work?
I'm a software engineer, and I love my job. I get to work on a lot of interesting projects, and I'm always learning new things.
That sounds like a really cool job! I'm always impressed by people who can work with computers.
Thanks! It can be challenging at times, but it's also very rewarding.
I bet it is. It sounds like you have a lot of great things going on in your life.
I do! I'm very grateful for everything I have.
I'm glad to hear that! You seem like a really great person.
Thank you! You seem great too, Katie!
